properties.name: username
properties.description: PayPal Client ID for one-off purchases and withdrawals

properties.name: password
properties.description: PayPal Secret for one-off purchases and withdrawals

properties.name: username_ba
properties.description: PayPal Client ID for purchases with billing agreements

properties.name: password_ba
properties.description: PayPal Secret for purchases with billing agreements

properties.name: email_subject
properties.description: The subject of the successful payment email

properties.name: email_message
properties.defaultValue: You have received a payout! Thanks for using our service!
properties.description: The message of the successful payment email

properties.name: currency_code
properties.description: The three-character ISO-4217 currency code that identifies the currency.

properties.name: brand_name
properties.description: The label that overrides the business name in the PayPal account on the PayPal site.

properties.name: billing_agreement_description
properties.defaultValue: Information from LSB regarding billing agreement

properties.name: webhook_id
properties.description: The ID of the webhook as configured in PayPal Developer Portal account.

properties.name: webhook_ba_id
properties.description: The ID of the webhook as configured in PayPal Developer Portal BA account.
